ygData.subject: Firing Sheets in North Freeport
ygData.msgSnippet: Howdy all - cross posted from the EQVaults Trade board. Subject Re: Pottery Nerfed, GM s & Merchants Posted by Cleric Taven Posted on 8/18/99 1:39 PM Was it
ygData.messageBody:
Howdy all - cross posted from the EQVaults Trade board.

Subject Re: Pottery Nerfed, GM's & Merchants
Posted by Cleric Taven
Posted on 8/18/99 1:39 PM

Was it just a good night on Veeshan or did
someone give the merchants in North Freeport
Firing sheets to sell?

Found at the INN next to the Pottery Wheel
and even the Clay merchant at the Armory.

Looking for other Potters to confirm.

In Reply to:
Subject Re: Pottery Nerfed, GM's & Merchants
Posted by Cleric Taven
Posted on 7/28/99 12:52 PM

>Yes Varant is working on it.

GM's:
That is one thing I miss from the old Message boards.
The occasional RED GM post to show US that Verant is listening to us rant.
I'd prefer to see an official NetRep assigned the task of monitoring these
message boards specfically as well as encourage the
Server assigned GMs to watch their named server's MB here.

What I'm equally curious about, were the economic changes for
sketches the only nerf? Has throwing clay gotten any easier?

NPCs:
At least for those of us near Freeport EAST Commonlands.
If Merra Clayfinger isn't up on his Roof dancing,
he's hanging out by the first huts and doesn't want
to be bothered. So much for fetching firing sheets.

I would like to see at least ONE merchant in town
who will also offer firing sheets.

Likewise, Prather is ALWAYS available when I need
to reload my baking supplies.
